thumb.title: 武術忍術 Ninjutsu Kurokumo Bushido Academy - Martial Arts
thumb.description: 武術デモンストレーション動画！忍術、黒龍流派。この忍者の流派はオランダにあります。ドイツにも忍術アカデミーがあります。Kurokumo Bushido Academy is a school for Ninjutsu. This school is located in Groningen the Netherlands and the lessons are given by Sensei Arjan Beens. Kurokumo Shinobi Goshido or just Goshido is a Ninja Martial Art which is rooted in Kuroi Ryu Ninjitsu also Koga Hai Lung Ryu Ninjitsu. In this video you see the training methods of the Kurokumo Bushido Academy. Martial Arts and Realistic Ninja Selfdefense.https://www.kurokumo-bushido.nl
